= Details =

{{{
Animal = $.klass({
  say: function( msg ){
    alert( msg );
  }
})

Dog = $.klass( Animal, {
  // called automatically
  init: function( name ){
    this.name = name;
    this.noise = 'Ruff! ';
  },
  say: function( msg ){
    this.super( arguments, this.noise + msg );
  }
})

fido = new Dog();
fido.bark( 'I want Kibbles and Bits' );
}}}
